mapper.select: select app_no , doc_no , emp_name , job_name , doc_type , decode(doc_type,0,'기안서',1,'품의서',2,'사직서') as "doc_name" , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"create_date" , update_date , doc_title , doc_content , doc_originname , doc_filepath , decode(app_status,0,'결재대기',1,'진행중',2,'결재완료',3,'반려',4,'임시저장') as "app_status" , app_count , app_turn from approval a join employee e on (e.emp_no = a.emp_no) join job j on (e.job_code = j.job_code) where doc_status in ('Y','D') and app_no = #{appNo}

select line_no , al.app_no , al.emp_no , emp_name , job_name , app_level , confirm_status , re_reason from app_line al join employee e on (e.emp_no = al.emp_no) join job j on (e.job_code = j.job_code) where al.app_no=#{appNo} order by app_level
select count(*) from approval ap join app_line al on (ap.app_no = al.app_no) where al.emp_no = #{empNo} and confirm_status = 0

select ap.app_no , emp_name , decode(doc_type,0,'기안서',1,'품의서',2,'사직서') as "doc_type" , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"create_date" , doc_title , doc_originname , decode(app_status,0,'결재대기',1,'진행중',2,'결재완료',3,'반려',4,'임시저장') as "app_status" from approval ap join employee e on (ap.emp_no = e.emp_no) join app_line al on (ap.app_no = al.app_no) where doc_status='Y' and confirm_status = 0 and al.emp_no = #{empNo} and app_status in (0,1) order by app_no desc
select count(*) from approval ap join app_line al on (ap.app_no = al.app_no) where al.emp_no = #{empNo} and confirm_status not in (0)

select ap.app_no , emp_name , decode(doc_type,0,'기안서',1,'품의서',2,'사직서') as "doc_type" , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"create_date" , doc_title , doc_originname , decode(app_status,0,'결재대기',1,'진행중',2,'결재완료',3,'반려',4,'임시저장') as "app_status" from approval ap join employee e on (ap.emp_no = e.emp_no) join app_line al on (ap.app_no = al.app_no) where doc_status='Y' and al.confirm_status not in (0) and al.emp_no = #{empNo} order by app_no desc
select count(*) from approval where emp_no = #{empNo} and app_status = 4 and doc_status = 'D' order by app_no desc

select ap.app_no , emp_name , decode(doc_type,0,'기안서',1,'품의서',2,'사직서') as "doc_type" , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"create_date" , doc_title , doc_originname , decode(app_status,0,'결재대기',1,'진행중',2,'결재완료',3,'반려',4,'임시저장') as "app_status" from approval ap join employee e on (ap.emp_no = e.emp_no) where doc_status = 'D' and app_status = 4 and ap.emp_no = #{empNo} order by app_no desc
mapper.update: update app_line set confirm_status = 1 , app_date = sysdate where app_no= #{appNo} and emp_no = #{empNo} and app_level = (select app_turn from approval where app_no=#{appNo})
update approval set app_status = case when app_count = app_turn then 2 else 1 end , app_turn = case when app_count != app_turn then app_turn+1 else app_turn end where app_no=#{appNo}
